rationale: MachineCard contains 15+ interactive elements including nested dropdowns, copy buttons, and status badges but most lack proper ARIA labels. This makes the component inaccessible to screen reader users and keyboard-only navigation.
problemSolved: Interactive elements like the failover strategy dropdown button (line 450-465), backup info badge (line 531-534), and IP copy button (line 671-680) have no aria-label. The nested dropdown menus (showStrategyMenu, showBackupInfo) lack aria-expanded state management. Focus is not trapped within popups.
